name: Froggy BOI
description:
Froggy BOI - a game about the usual schoolboy, who was going home from school, in his backpack he had only pens, pencils and textbooks. He decided to shorten the path and go home through the forest, but accidentally turned not there and got into a magical swamp, the portal opened abruptly and an entire army of frog killers began to go on, who were already ready to tear his body! But he found a solution, he began to throw in them his bad grades, the benefit of it was a lot!

You have to shoot an army of frogs that will endlessly go to you from the portal, while jumping all over the platforms to energetic music!
